data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Ul‘yanovsk, Russia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ul‘yanovsk, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Ul'yanovsk that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Ul'yanovsk. Through your servants plant 270 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ul‘yanovsk, Russia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Yakut people. Make the Yakut people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, help the 19,767 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,330,934 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ul‘yanovsk, Russia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the state of Ul‘yanovsk, Russia has a population of 1,350,700.

We estimate Ul'yanovsk has 19,767 people who might know Jesus, 758,124 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 572,810 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Ul'yanovsk access to a Bible in their own language.
